content.text: Hi there! I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw, design, and watch movies.
Oh, that's cool! I like to draw too. What kind of things do you draw?
I draw mostly traditional art, but I'm also learning how to animate.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to animate. What inspired you to become a graphic designer?
I've always loved drawing, and I've always been fascinated by the way animation works. I started out by drawing cartoons, and then I eventually started working on my own animated projects.
That's really cool! Do you have any favorite animations?
I love all of Studio Ghibli's movies, and I also love the work of Disney and Pixar.
Those are all great movies! I've seen most of them.
I think my favorite movie is Howl's Moving Castle.
That's a great movie! I love the animation and the story.
Me too! It's so visually stunning.
I agree. It's one of my favorite animated movies of all time.
